full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG GI GTOR CHOG BSKANG GSO CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @044A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BSLU BA CING GTOR MA BUL BA'I RGYUD KYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG GIS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING, RGYUD SDE DANG MI MTHUN PA'I LOG CHOS MANG POS MASMAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING TSA TSANG BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS GANGS MGUL DBEN @044B GNAS RIN CHEN 'BAR BA'I SDENGS SU SBYOR BA'O, ,AE WAm NI, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,DGE BA'I LEGS LDAN RGYAS PAR SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
